_description: John Audelay, An orison of the Wounds and the ‘Arms of Christ’ — twenty-three 6-line stanzas

BodDou302.First Lines:
An holy prayer here bygynnesIn remedy of sene dedly
                    synnes…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…þat heren & don after godis word& holdyn hit in
                    mynd
BodDou302.Attributed Title:
De effusione Sanguinis Cristi in remisione peccatorum (f.
                        8rb); Explicit de Sanguine Cristi (f.
                    9ra)

                Lincoln and Cambridge
Percy Society
         14. London: T. Richards, 1844: 55-60.
Whiting,  Ella Keats,
                        ed.
